name: WASDead [REMASTERED]
description: WASDead is a hardcore action platformer where you assume control over the character R in his quest to collect MONEY. Why? Because money makes you feel good!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 60 MB available space Additional Notes: PS3 / PS4 / Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controllers or Direct Input compatible controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 60 MB available space Additional Notes: Full HD Display, PS3 / PS4 / Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controllers or Direct Input compatible controller
